attributes.action: Change the University Fees of International Students from £21,000+ to £10,000
attributes.additional_details:
Parliamentary debates involving MPs and international students are crucial since they constitute a majority of the student population in the UK.  Moving to different countries and adds higher costs of living costs, visa application etc.
The international students are one of the main source of income for any higher education system and the constant negligence of international students from the discourse showcases their role of as 'cash-cows' for any university's profit.
attributes.background: Call on the government to consider holding debates in Parliament between MPs and university international students to raise/discuss issues that affect them.

rejection.details:
Fees for international students are set by individual universities, not the Government or House of Commons, but you may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require Universities to partially refund tuition fees for 19/20 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550738

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762
